title: Revlon ColorStay Makeup, Combination/Oily Skin, Cappuccino, 1 Ounce
description: Revlon ColorStay Makeup for Combination/Oily Skin Longwearing coverage with a lightweight formula that won't cake, fade, or rub off. With Time Release Technology specifically formulated for combination or oily skin to control oil absorption and shine. Your look stays flawless throughout the day.- Makeup feels comfortable and wears up to 24 hours.- Medium to full coverage.- Comes in 20 beautiful shades. TIPS: • Apply to clean skin.• Using your fingertips or applicator, blend foundation onto skin, starting in the center of your face, forehead, nose and chin blending outward.

title: Maybelline New York Mineral Power Powder Foundation, Natural Ivory, 0.28 Ounce
description: Mineral power natural perfecting powder foundation with 100% micro minerals not only provides flawless coverage, but also makes your skin clearer, smoother and more radiant  even when you’re not wearing any. Results clinically proven after 8 weeks: 52% improvement in skin smoothness; 49% improvement in skin luminosity; 43% reduction in redness. Buildable, even coverage. Tested on sensitive skin. Won’t clog pores. Contains 0% oil, 0% talc, 0% preservatives and 0% fragrance. spf 18. *based on a clinical study

title: Earth Therapeutics Hydro Exfoliating Towel, 1 each
description: 3 ft long x 1 ft wide. Perfect length for washing your own back. This towel is excellent for gently buffing away dead skin cells, opening clogged pores and cleansing the skin of impurities. A mainstay in Asian bathing cultures, this towel also massages the skin and stimulates the circulation of blood throughout the body. Not too rough, not to soft, this wash cloth achieves just the right balance. Not tested on animal. Product of Taiwan.

title: Kleancolor - Neon Brights - 6 Nail Lacquer Colors
description: This is one of the best quality nail lacquers I've ever tried. It's probably better than what you're using now. I put on one coat and couldn't believe the coverage, drying time, sheen or how many days it lasted. I love it.

title: EcoTools BAMBOO 6-pc Makeup Brush Set 1206
description: Set includes: Blush brush, Eyeshadow brush, Angled eyeliner brush, Concealer brush, Lash & brow groomer, carrying case. Start with the concealer brush to hide any imperfections. Swipe the blush brush for a flawless application of your perfect cheek color. Highlight your eyes instantly with our eye shading makeup brush before adding definition with the angled eyeliner brush. Finish it all off with the lash & brow groomer to separate your lashes and smooth brows for a complete, beautiful look. Protect your makeup brushes in the dual-pocket cosmetics bag. Synthetic bristles are cruelty free. Experience the incredibly soft touch of cruelty-free bristles EcoTools beauty solutions promote Living Beautifully! We are inspired by beauty inside and out, and in the world around us. While we always want to look our best, we feel even better when we can make earth-conscious choices. Best known for our incredibly soft cosmetic brushes, and bamboo handles, we take pride in offering a collection of cosmetic makeup brushes, hairbrushes, lashes and bath products that feature innovative materials. Cleaning your Makeup Brushes Unclean makeup brushes transfer old makeup, germs, and bacteria to your skin each time you use them. Ideally, you should wash them once a week, and here’s the best way how:   Run the bristles of makeup brush under warm running water. Careful not to get the ferrules and handles wet.  Apply a drop of gentle shampoo or clarifying cleanser to bristles and work into a light lather.  Rinse bristles thoroughly under warm, running water.  Continue rinsing until water runs clear.  Use a cloth to absorb excess water and reshape the bristles  Lay your makeup brushes flat or “handles up” to air dry

title: Thermafuse One Pass F450 Hot Iron Smoothing Cream 3 oz
description: Thermafuse F450� One Pass rnHot Iron Activated Smoothing Creme - the next generation in temporary smoothing and straightening products. The core philosophy of Thermafuse has always been to "make heat good for hair." Tests conclude that F450� one pass with HSC and CFC will leave hair in better condition at temperatures up to 450� Fahrenheit. F450� One Pass is:rnA temporary smoothing/straightening productrnFormaldehyde-freernA styling product developed for use with extreme heat fl at irons and appliances..to 450�FrnF450� One Pass will:rnProvide moisture & protein conditioning to combat dry, brittle hair caused by extreme heatrnResist reversion from moisture/humidityrnReduce friction and cuticle abrasionrnPromote fast & easy stylingrnIncreases thermal protection by 20% or morernMake hair smooth and sleek, with incredible shinernThermaFuse products are sulfate-free, sodium-free, paraben-free, and 100% Vegan. And, ThermaFuse maintains a "NO ANIMAL TESTING" policy.

title: Izunami Flat Iron Ktx450
description:
Product Description
IZUNAMI KTX is an exclusive design specifically created for Keratin Treatments. KTX's titanium plates prevent static electricity while smoothing and coating hair cuticles to revitalize dry and damaged hair. This titanium metal is not only scratch resistant and durable but is exceptionally lightweight. Titanium is a metallic element best known for its high strength and low density. While very lightweight, it provides superior heat conductibility, exceptionally resistant to chemical corrosion, and can withstand high heat. In addition to its ability to inhibit bacteria build ups, its biocompatible nature is non toxic and non allergenic. Two independent heat sensors regulate the temperature of each plate simultaneously so that both plates maintain consistent temperature without overheating. With the use of Kyocera MCH Heater, our advanced flash heating technology ensures immediate heat to reach its desired temperature in shortest time. REQDTM (Rapid Engagement and quick disengagement) technology enables multiple sessions of heat recovery in less than a second to maintain the set temperature without heat fluctuation. Moisture molecules in hair are reduced in size, enhancing their natural properties to give shiny, healthy results.

title: Pixi Correction Concentrate Concealer, Brightening Peach
description: Highly pigmented, this correction concealer instantly erases darkness, softens and blurs lines. Skin immediately looks fresh, rested, bright and youthful. This ultimate ‘good night’s sleep in a jar’ camouflage cream is correction perfection in a pot.

title: Tarte Lights, Camera, Lashes! Mascara
description: Tarte Lights, Camera, Lashes! 4-in-1 Mascara could be considered a push-up bra for your lashes-a 4-in-1 (lengthening, curling, volumizing, and conditioning) dermatologist- and clinically-proven to increase the appearance of lash volume by 424% after applying giving dramatic, thick and sexy lashes.

title: John Frieda Frizz, Ease Heat Defeat Heat Protection Spray, 6 oz,
description: Works with heat tools. Conditions and strengthens for up to 24 hours. ThermaGuard Complex protects against damage. Defend straight styles to the end. This protective spray straightens strands for up to 24 hours. This helps block humidity and rehydrates.

title: Wet n Wild Coloricon Bronzer with SPF 15, RESERVE YOUR CABANA
description: Add a golden glow and a touch of luminosity to any complexion for a healthy, sun kissed look. Special blend of treated nylon powders provide long lasting, blendable color. Dermatologist tested.

title: Conair Pro Tourmaline Universal Finger Diffuser, Black
description: Conair pro tourmaline finger diffuser creates negative ions for faster, smoother and more gentle drying. This is a universal fit for Conair / Babyliss dryers but not universal to all dryers out there. Also there are 3 other Babyliss diffusers as well. Model #’s for them. BABDF1(for full size dryers),BABDF2(for mid-size dryers), AND BABDF06 (doesn’t specify size)

title: Yerba Prima Tampico Skin Brush 1 Ea
description: The Yerba Prima Tampico Skin Brush is a wonderful, revitalizing health and beauty aid. Removing the top layer of dead skin and stimulating the circulation of blood feeding the skin are essential for maintaining youthful, glowing and supple skin

title: Revlon RV544PKF 1875W Tourmaline Ionic Ceramic Dryer
description: Revlon 1875 Watt Tourmaline Ionic Lightweight Dryer feature Tourmaline Ionic Technology for ultimate shine, volume, and healthier looking styles. This dryer features an ion indicator light, separate heat and speed rocker switches, 2 heat/2 speed settings, cold shot button, hinged endcap, anti-skid bumpers, and concentrator and finger diffuser attachments. This ultra lightweight design is 25% lighter than your average dryer and has a sleek and upscale spray finish. This unit is super quiet and fast drying.
